title: Why is it that 90% of champions that get reworked become stupidly broken overpowered
body:
And need massive nerfs to bring them back in line? 

{{champion:122}} was oppressively overpowered until he received multiple nerfs
{{champion:41}} Is still stupidly broken and has 95% ban rate in LCS
{{champion:104}} Can two shot champions with his burst 
{{champion:21}} Was (and still is) a top tier ADC with heavy damage despite nerfing 
{{champion:82}} Was stupidly broken when reworked and got nerfed back to obscurity after having a 98% ban rate in LCS
{{champion:78}} Is ridiculously broken 
{{champion:114}} Pretty much auto wins games with her kit now.

and so on. 

Does riot even test these changes? It's pretty much commonplace to accept that a champion that gets reworked is going to be broken as all hell for a good while until riot eventually decides to bring them back into order. 

Why can't they actually balance their champions that they release and rework? Maybe they need to hire an actual balance team instead of not having one.
